cards.title: Kumiho
setup: At the start of the game, {Kumiho} enters play Soul Eater side up.
Stolen Soul is put into play.
gameplay: Increase damage dealt by the hero next to Stolen Soul by 1.
If the hero next to Stolen Soul would deal damage to {Kumiho}, redirect that damage to the other hero with the highest HP.
At the start of the villain turn, if Stolen Soul is not in play, {Kumiho} flips.
cards.advanced: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
flippedGameplay: When {Kumiho} is flipped to this side, restore it to 25 HP, if it is not already higher.
Increase damage dealt by Kumiho and Ghosts by {H - 2}.
At the end of the villain turn, {Kumiho} deals each hero target 1 infernal damage. Then if there are no ghosts in play, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Increase damage dealt by Kumiho and Ghosts by 1.
cards.challengeText: Put 20 cards under Stolen Soul initially, not 10

openingLines.default: Welcome to my domain, children. Enjoy your stay.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.NinetailsCharacter: Come to me, my daughter. Your destiny awaits you.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrowNinetailsCharacter: Ah, the prodigal daughter returns. You have grown into a fine little fox, haven't you?
openingLines.NinetailsBureauAgentCharacter: This is your last chance to join me. I will devour you!
openingLines.NinetailsFlamePriestessCharacter: You've travelled far. You're too weak to stop me.

cards.title: Stolen Soul
cards.body: This card is indestructible. Play this card next to the hero with the lowest HP. Put the top 10 cards of that hero's deck underneath this card. When the hero next to this card deals damage to a hero, move the top card from beneath this card to its owner's trash. Then, if there are no cards beneath this one, remove this card from the game. If the hero next to this card is incapacitated, their soul is devoured. Game Over.
cards.flavorReference: Jade Fisher, Guardians of Tomorrow Annual #5

cards.title: Duplicitous Wisp
cards.body: At the start of the villain turn, this card deals all targets in the play area of the hero with the most cards in play 3 radiant damage, then, if Stolen Soul is in play, this card puts itself under it. Otherwise, destroy {H} hero non-character cards.
cards.flavorText: I knew we shouldn't have followed that{br}light!

cards.title: Fox Pup
cards.body: At the end of the villian turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 melee, 1 fire, and 1 infernal damage. Then, if Stolen Soul is in play, the hero next to it must discard a card.
cards.flavorText: If that's what happens if I join you, I{br}want none of it.

cards.title: Soul Embers
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, {Kumiho} deals the hero with the most cards in play 1 fire damage. If Stolen Soul is in play, put the top card of that hero's deck under it. Otherwise, {Kumiho} deals them an additional 2 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: Delicious. And yours will be too, my dear.

cards.title: Dark Domain
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1. Whenever a Ghost is destroyed, {Kumiho} gains 3 HP.
cards.flavorText: All blood spilled here feeds me.

cards.title: Seeds of Doubt
cards.body: {Kumiho} deals the hero with the fewest cards in play 1 toxic damage and 1 psychic damage. Then, if Stolen Soul is in play, this card puts itself under it. Otherwise, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: Do they really trust you? Do they not{br}remember what you've done?

cards.title: Illusory Inferno
cards.body: Each hero may discard 2 cards. Each hero that does deals themself 1 psychic damage. {Kumiho} deals each hero that does not 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: It can't hurt you if you don't believe in it!
You haven't been burned by it!

cards.title: Fear Itself
cards.body: Play the top cards of the villain and environment decks. {Kumiho} deals each hero target 1 irreducible psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: It's just some dark woods. There's{br}nothing to fear here.

cards.title: Ghoulish Hunters
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 melee and 1 cold damage. If a target is destroyed this way, restore this card to 5 HP, then play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: My lesser devotees will devour anyone{br}foolish enough to enter my realm.

cards.title: Ravening
cards.body: Until the start of the villain turn, increase all damage dealt by villain targets and the hero next to Stolen Soul by 1. The hero next to Stolen Soul deals themself 1 irreducible toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: Do you feel it? You must feed, or your{br}flame will be snuffed.
